mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.broker_id AS "broker.id", bb.nickname AS "broker.nickname", a.points_id AS "points.id", pp.name AS "points.name", pp.points AS "points.points", pp.price AS "points.price", a.amount AS "amount", a.payment_date AS "paymentDate", a.trade_no AS "tradeNo", a.trade_state AS "tradeState", a.transaction_id AS "transactionId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN x_sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_broker bb ON bb.id = a.broker_id LEFT JOIN wx_points pp ON pp.id = a.points_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wx_payment_point( id, broker_id, points_id, amount, payment_date, trade_no, trade_state, transaction_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{broker.id}, #{points.id}, #{amount}, #{paymentDate}, #{tradeNo}, #{tradeState}, #{transactionId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wx_payment_point SET trade_state = #{result_code}, transaction_id = #{transaction_id}, update_date = now() WHERE trade_no = #{out_trade_no}

UPDATE wx_payment_point SET broker_id = #{broker.id}, points_id = #{points.id}, amount = #{amount}, payment_date = #{paymentDate}, trade_no = #{tradeNo}, trade_state = #{tradeState}, transaction_id = #{transactionId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
